attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to make someone take notice of how Britain's roads are in disrepair. Pot holes can cause Tyre wear suspension issues and even engine problem which all cost money to fix, then the issue of fuel consumption, also can cause accident due to either people trying to dodge them or due to loosing control hitting one,

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
